actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to allow the importation of certain strategic materials which are shipped from a country, other than southern Rhodesia, under a contract entered into before March 18, l977, and which the seller certifies are not of southern Rhodesian origin.

summary.text: Amends the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to permit importation of chrome, shipped from a country other than Rhodesia under a contract entered into prior to March 18, 1977, if the seller is not of Southern Rhodesian origin.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to allow the importation of certain strategic materials which are shipped from a country, other than southern Rhodesia, under a contract entered into before March 18, l977, and which the seller certifies are not of southern Rhodesian origin.
